patterns_discovered: Filter method pattern: RLock, iterate, append matches, return slice copy
Consistent method signature for message filtering methods
Incremental feature implementation across conversation filtering methods
gotchas_discovered: Importance of thread safety in concurrent message access
Handling edge cases like empty agent ID or no matching messages
Need to return a copy of messages to prevent direct slice mutation
recommendations: Implement comprehensive unit tests for new filter methods
Maintain consistent thread-safe pattern across all new methods
Use Go race detector to verify concurrent access safety
Consider performance implications of creating message copies
Document method behaviors for empty/nil input scenarios
